snippet.title: Moon Samurai - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
●  Developer: Nunchaku Games
●  Website: https://nunchakugames.com/
●  Release Date: TBA
●  Platforms: Nintendo Switch, PC, Mac
●  Social: 
Twitter | https://twitter.com/NunchakuGames
Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/nunchaku_games/
Vkontakte | https://vk.com/nunchakugames
Facebook | https://www.facebook.com/NunchakuGames/

Moon Samurai – 2D pixel-graphics action adventure game set in cyberpunk universe.


You will play as a young futuristic samurai named Buddy. Fight your way through a dangerous sci-fi world, unravel its mysteries and escape all the traps. Tornadic scuffle against a broad range of enemies will go hand in hand with exciting parkour-style jumping over rooftops, balconies and ladders. 

The game draws its inspiration from old-school martial arts movies, cyberpunk culture and 80-90’s retro-games: Prince of Persia, Double Dragon, Comix Zone, Oni, Battletoads, Karateka and others.
